alert.note: Alert for Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Southwest Big Horn Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 12 at 10:43PM MST until December 14 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches for lower elevations, and 12 to 18 inches for the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Southwest Big Horn Basin and Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing and drifting of snow is possible, which would result in severely reduced visibility at times, including through Wind River Canyon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Southwest Big Horn Basin
